basics.name: Minseong Cho
basics.summary: Currently a graduate researcher at Ajou University. My research interests include active matter dynamics, the Leidenfrost effect, and hair dynamics.

work experience.name: Softlab, Ajou University
work experience.summary: Undergraduate research intern studying boundary-driven active matter systems based on the elastic Leidenfrost effect in soft hydrogels.
highlights: Investigated boundary-driven active matter powered by the Leidenfrost effect in soft hydrogels
Designed and conducted experiments on hydrogel dynamics under thermal gradients
Analyzed motion, energy injection, and collective dynamics using quantitative data analysis
Keywords: Active matter, boundary-driven motion, elastic Leidenfrost effect

publications.name: Paper Title Number 1
publications.summary: This paper is about the number 1. The number 2 is left for future work.
